content.description: Two beautiful large boulders at the top of Silver Ledge. Aretes, jugs, knobs, handles, flakes. Easy holds but bold angles for big throws and hero moves, some overhangs with plenty to grab on to, pumpy traverses. Sit start options in a few spots. Plenty of V0-3 options, harder lines possible. Super safe landings and angled walk offs.Shaded, so any time of day works. Clean *enough*, no major scrubbing required to cruise on the easier stuff, although there is plenty of vegetation and a few select spots could use a polish. Worth the approach.Â
